mapper.update: UPDATE airplanes SET capacity = #{capacity} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT airplanes.id AS airplane_id, airlines.id AS airline_id, airlines.name AS airline_name, airlines.code AS airline_code, airplane_types.id AS type_id, airplane_types.brand AS type_brand, airplane_types.model AS type_model, airplanes.capacity AS airplane_capacity, employees.id AS employee_id, employees.first_name AS employee_first_name, employees.last_name AS employee_last_name, packages.id AS package_id, packages.name AS package_name, packages.address AS package_address FROM airplanes LEFT JOIN airlines ON airline.airplane_id = airplanes.id LEFT JOIN airplane_types ON airplane_types.airplane_id = airplanes.id LEFT JOIN employees ON employees.airplane_id = airplanes.id LEFT JOIN packages ON packages.airplane_id = airplanes.id;

SELECT packages.id AS package_id, packages.name AS package_name, packages.address AS package_address FROM airplanes LEFT JOIN packages ON packages.airplane_id = airplanes.id WHERE airplanes.id = #{id};

SELECT employees.id AS employee_id, employees.first_name AS employee_first_name, employees.last_name AS employee_last_name FROM airplanes LEFT JOIN employees ON employees.airplane_id = airplanes.id WHERE airplanes.id = #{id};
